Package ui.drawing.composition

Class BufferedSectionComposer<T extends BufferedSection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.DrawableBufferedSection
        • ui.drawing.composition.BufferedSectionComposer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of sections that can be stored in the composer.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferedSection, OrderedSectionComposer<T>, SectionComposer<T>, PrintHandler, Section
    public class BufferedSectionComposer<T extends BufferedSection>
extends DrawableBufferedSection
implements OrderedSectionComposer<T>
    Stores a set of buffered sections and draws them in order to the buffer. The order is determined first by the z-index and then by the coordinate; top left to bottom right.
    A buffered section implementation.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferedSectionComposer

        public BufferedSectionComposer​(int width,
                               int height,
                               ColouredChar filler)
        Constructor for BufferedSectionComposer. A tree map is used to order the sections by z index then x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the composer in characters.
        height - The height of the composer in characters.
        filler - The character to fill the buffer with.

      • BufferedSectionComposer

        public BufferedSectionComposer​(int width,
                               int height)
        Constructor for BufferedSectionComposer with default filler character.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the composer in characters.
        height - The height of the composer in characters.

      • update

        public void update()
        Called before drawing the section. In this case call the update method of every contained section in order and copy their buffer into the buffer of this.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Section
        Overrides:
